Name: Sunlit Priestess
Story Background: The Sunlit Priestess is a devout follower of the light, offering prayers for protection and guidance to her fellow allies.
Ability: When Sunlit Priestess enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
Appearance Description: The Sunlit Priestess is cloaked in golden robes, with her face illuminated by a gentle glow, representing her devotion to the forces of light.
